name: KiithsRebalance
title: Kiith's Rebalance and Tweaks
author: Kiithnaras
description: A series of balancing and tweak changes to both the vanilla Factorio experience and alterations/additions to certain mods. Vanilla changes principally affect industry scalability and basic equipment. Affects optional dependency mods (AAI Industry, Space Exploration, and Krastorio2) as well as Cargo Ships, Electric Train, VortiK's Cannon Turret, and Realistic Fusion Power
